channel.title: Education on Boettiger Group
channel.description: Recent content in Education on Boettiger Group

item.title: Friday
item.description: A day’s agenda Scott’s got us going on aR package forPLoS API, released Tuesday. Checked over the package and did some basic reorganization to put it in R package form. lots of feedback on my FF question on pw vs private for delayed-disclosure entries. warning signals manuscript package, figures, writing 9-11a Going through Peter’s revisions 11-1p Meeting with Peter & Graham 1-2p Meeting with Mikaela, Betta for GTC 2-4 PDG on Brian’s Autoparts paper 4-5:30 Colored git diff’s etc (from progit.
